casebody.data:
DAVID N.J.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 12, 2017

Vishal K. Garg, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner David N.J.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 862, 156 A.3d 55 (2017), is denied.
